title: Bitcoin Price Careens Toward $20,000 as Cryptocurrency Rout Deepens
sub_head: Retreat has wiped out roughly 1½ years of gains for bitcoin
body:
Cryptocurrencies extended their slide Wednesday, with bitcoin on the verge of falling below $20,000 for the first time since December 2020.
Bitcoin’s price fell to around $20,526.57 in early U.S. trading. That marks a 6.7% drop from Tuesday’s 5 p.m. ET price and a 70% plunge from a high of $68,990.90 reached in November 2021, according to CoinDesk.
